captions.text:
- You worked at
All-American Burger!
- Seven months ago.

[ Laughs ]
All l need are
some tastywaves,

l t's the first door
on the left.

Money, and l want it now.
Now!

l've been watchin' this place.
l know what l'm doin'.

Open it up.
Open it up!

l just started here.
Theyjust taught me
the procedure and l--

- Come on, shit head. Let's go.
- Get offmy case, motherfucker.

l gotyou,
you son ofa bitch.

title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High (10/10) Movie CLIP - Mi-T Man (1982) HD
